creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
dimension: each sheet: 14 × 9 1/4 in. (35.5 × 23.5 cm) (image, sheet, vertical ōban)
inscription: The name of each warrior is written beside its figure

title: Picture of the Loyal Retainers' Vengenance
